{
  "explanation": "The purpose described in the request is related to managing interactions and persistent information about a chat ID to maintain the same chat session as the customer navigates throughout different pages on a site. This most closely aligns with purposes involving maintaining customer activity consistency and session management. Therefore, the most appropriate match is 'Customer Relationship Management', which encompasses managing and analyzing interactions with customers. No terms explicitly describing the maintenance of a chat ID for session persistence specifically were found, thus no unmatched concepts.",
